Description.Text: Overlooking Beautiful Killington Lakes. Ideally located for the Lake District National Park. Lake Windermere. K Village Factory Outlet Shopping. Oxenholme Train Station 10 Miles. Pets Accepted - 10 GBP Charge Per Pet Per Stay. Maximum 3 pets per room 10 pounds per pet per night. This Hotel is located off the Southbound carriage way of the M6 Motorway just after Junction 37 of the M6. Please do not rely on directions via satellite navigation using the post code, call hotel directly for assistance. We are in touch with the providers and hope to resolve the problem soon. If heading North on the M6 please exit at Junction 37 and take the south bound carriageway. The exit for the hotel and the services is only a few minutes from the junction.

The hotel is located for the Lake District National Park. Lake Windermere. K Village Factory Outlet Shopping. Oxenholme Train Station 10 Miles. This Hotel is located off the Southbound carriage way of the M6 Motorway just after Junction 37 of the M6.
